cause.description:
JohnRobert Johnsen was a normal 1 year old. Until he turned about 13 months and he stopped doing all the things he learned. Walking went first, then sitting up, then supporting his head. After an MRI @ A.I. Dupont he was diagnosed with pontine glioma. They went for a 2nd opinion @ CHOP and they confirmed the same diagnoses. Pontine Glioma is only about 50 causes nationwide a year and has no cause/ cure. JohnRobert is currently being treated at CHOP. He's undergoing chemotherapy and radiation.
We need a miracle here!
1. Miracle for JohnRobert!
cause.mission: Help find a cure for PONTINE GLIOMA
cause.name: JohnRobert Johnsen
